# The `edit_distance.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines a Levenshtein distance function that works for any two sequences, with each element of each sequence being analogous to a character in a string. <a href="#details">More...</a>

This is an optimization pass for GlobalISel generic memory operations. <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This file defines a Levenshtein distance function that works for any two sequences, with each element of each sequence being analogous to a character in a string.

<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &lt;algorithm&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Determine the edit distance between two sequences.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param FromArray the first sequence to compare.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param ToArray the second sequence to compare.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param Map A Functor to apply to each item of the sequences before</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// comparison.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param AllowReplacements whether to allow element replacements (change one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// element into another) as a single operation, rather than as two operations</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// (an insertion and a removal).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\param MaxEditDistance If non-zero, the maximum edit distance that this</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// routine is allowed to compute. If the edit distance will exceed that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// maximum, returns \\c MaxEditDistance+1.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\returns the minimum number of element insertions, removals, or (if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\p AllowReplacements is \\c true) replacements needed to transform one of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the given sequences into the other. If zero, the sequences are identical.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Functor&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0947a70171b7e63f155a2eae2bfd706"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0947a70171b7e63f155a2eae2bfd706">ComputeMappedEditDistance</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;</a> FromArray, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;</a> ToArray,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   Functor Map, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AllowReplacements = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxEditDistance = 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The algorithm implemented below is the &quot;classic&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dynamic-programming algorithm for computing the Levenshtein</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distance, which is described here:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Levenshtein&#95;distance</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Although the algorithm is typically described using an m x n</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// array, only one row plus one element are used at a time, so this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// implementation just keeps one vector for the row.  To update one entry,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// only the entries to the left, top, and top-left are needed.  The left</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// entry is in Row&#91;x-1&#93;, the top entry is what&#39;s in Row&#91;x&#93; from the last</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iteration, and the top-left entry is stored in Previous.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a14feba3df516c82f8e016374ef4df18b">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;::size&#95;type</a> m = FromArray.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a14feba3df516c82f8e016374ef4df18b">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;::size&#95;type</a> n = ToArray.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxEditDistance) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the difference in size between the 2 arrays is larger than the max</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// distance allowed, we can bail out as we will always need at least</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MaxEditDistance insertions or removals.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a14feba3df516c82f8e016374ef4df18b">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;::size&#95;type</a> AbsDiff = m &gt; n ? m - n : n - m;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AbsDiff &gt; MaxEditDistance)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxEditDistance + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 64&gt;</a> Row(n + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 1; i &lt; Row.size(); ++i)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">    Row&#91;i&#93; = i;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a14feba3df516c82f8e016374ef4df18b">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;::size&#95;type</a> y = 1; y &lt;= m; ++y) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">    Row&#91;0&#93; = y;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BestThisRow = Row&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Previous = y - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;CurItem = Map(FromArray&#91;y - 1&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a14feba3df516c82f8e016374ef4df18b">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;::size&#95;type</a> x = 1; x &lt;= n; ++x) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OldRow = Row&#91;x&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AllowReplacements) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">        Row&#91;x&#93; = std::min(Previous + (CurItem == Map(ToArray&#91;x - 1&#93;) ? 0u : 1u),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">                          std::min(Row&#91;x - 1&#93;, Row&#91;x&#93;) + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurItem == Map(ToArray&#91;x - 1&#93;))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">          Row&#91;x&#93; = Previous;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Row&#91;x&#93; = std::min(Row&#91;x-1&#93;, Row&#91;x&#93;) + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">      Previous = OldRow;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">      BestThisRow = std::min(BestThisRow, Row&#91;x&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxEditDistance &amp;&amp; BestThisRow &gt; MaxEditDistance)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxEditDistance + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result = Row&#91;n&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7dd37b8e348fbe4c8c870ca00415da92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7dd37b8e348fbe4c8c870ca00415da92">ComputeEditDistance</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;</a> FromArray, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;T&gt;</a> ToArray,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AllowReplacements = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxEditDistance = 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0947a70171b7e63f155a2eae2bfd706">ComputeMappedEditDistance</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      FromArray, ToArray, &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>) -&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp; &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>; &#125;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">      AllowReplacements, MaxEditDistance);</Highlight></CodeLine>
